name: 终点论坛(仅支持1.1.6.5+)
introduction:
Galgame资源搜索,可以搜索一些游戏资源**注意:
该搜索源需登录
需要回复帖子才能获取资源链接
******

auth.logged: function Main(html){if(html.indexOf('信息提示-终点分享')!=-1){return true;}else{return false;};}

search.list: function Main(html){var formhash = jsoup(html,'[name=formhash]@attr->value');html = httpRequest('https://bbs.zdfx.net/search.php?mod=forum@post->formhash='+formhash+'&srchtxt=[$key]&searchsubmit=yes@charset->UTF-8@header->content-type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.111 Safari/537.36');return jsoups(html,'#threadlist > ul > li:contains(【)');}
search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'h3.xs3 > a');}
search.url: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'h3.xs3 > a@attr->href')+'@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.4.2; Nexus 4 Build/KOT49H) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Mobile Safari/537.36';}
